Lyric:
[by:灯等等灯]
[00:05]Loving him is like driving a new Maserati down a dead-end street
[00:15]Faster than the wind, passionate as sin, ending so suddenly
[00:21]Loving him is like trying to change your mind once you’re already flying through the free fall
[00:30]Like the colors in autumn, so bright just before they lose it all
[00:37]Losing him was blue like I’d never known
[00:41]Missing him was dark grey all alone
[00:45]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[00:53]But loving him was red
[00:57]Yeah red
[01:00]Touching him was like realizing all you ever wanted was right there in front of you
[01:08]Memorizing him was as easy as knowing all the words to your old favorite song
[01:16]Fighting with him was like trying to solve a crossword and realizing there’s no right answer
[01:24]Regretting him was like wishing you never found out that love could be that strong
[01:32]Losing him was blue like I’d never known
[01:36]Missing him was dark grey all alone
[01:40]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[01:47]But loving him was red
[01:51]Yeah red
[01:55]Burning red
[02:02]Remembering him comes in flashbacks and echoes
[02:07]Tell myself it’s time now, gotta let go
[02:11]But moving on from him is impossible
[02:14]When I still see it all in my head
[02:18]Burning red
[02:27]Losing him was blue like I’d never known
[02:31]Missing him was dark grey all alone
[02:34]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[02:42]But loving him was red
[02:46]Yeah red
[02:50]Burning red
[02:58]Burning red
